name: Dog Puzzle
description:
Help the two dogs dig out the bones they hid in the dirt...
"Dog Puzzle" is a challenging puzzle game that requires you to think carefully without worrying about time limits.
The rules are simple, but there are 60 stages that will make you rack your brain.
Please try it.

h2] How to play[/h2]

・ The goal opens when you operate the dog and find all the bones hidden under the ground.
・ Dogs cannot climb up without a ladder.
・ If there is nothing below the stone, it will fall.
・ Dogs can be moved by pushing stones.
・ Dogs cannot be crushed by stones.

・ In addition, you can cooperate with two dogs to clear, blow away stones with bombs,
　　A variety of 60 stages are waiting for you.
